summary: This is a brief email from July 24, 2019, requesting a daily update on inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status and any issues. It appears to be internal communication regarding his incarceration, sent shortly before his death.

events.title: Request for Daily Inmate Update
events.description: An email is sent requesting a daily update on inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status and any issues to be aware of.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 24, 2019, concerning inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
It requests a daily update on Epstein's status and any issues, indicating active monitoring.
The email is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and originates from the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files.
This communication occurred approximately two weeks before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
